methods.addMain:
Add a slot in the main table.

:param cookie: long
:param slot: (long) - the slot to add.
:param originalRightValue: (long) - if we are the addition of the slot, what the right value was before our modification
        (otherwise ignored)
:param flags: (byte) - the flags to or into our state
:return: (long) the cookie for future access
methods.moveTableLocation:
Move a main table location.

:param cookie: long
:param oldTableLocation: (long) - the old hash slot
:param newTableLocation: (long) - the new hash slot

text:
A tracker for modified join hash table slots.

 After adding an entry, you get back a cookie, which must be passed in on future modification operations for that
 slot.

 To process the entries after modifications are complete, call forAllModifiedSlots(ModifiedSlotConsumer).
